text: Ic Eadwine munuk cilda mæstere an Niwan mynstre grete þe wel Ælfsige biscop.
Ic kyþe <þe> laford þæt nu for þreon gearan ic læig innan minan portice anbuton nontid & me atewde þær þe halga Cuthbert openlice.
Ic þæs swiþe bliþe wæs.
Ic eode to minan abbode Ælfwine & bed hinæ þæt ic moste norþ faran to þan halgan & hine gesecan.
Ac min abbod Ælfwine me þæs forwirnde & eac forbead.
Ic þa fæng on minne agænne ræd & eode me þidær norð.
& me þær Ægelwine bisceop mid weorscipe underfeng.
Me geuþe God & þe halga þæt ic hine minan handan <gewochs> & his heafod mid kambe gekemde & his hær mid scearan gæcearf & hine eall myd nywan scrude gescrydde & his ealde claþas him fram genam.
Sum ic þær let & sum ic her habbe.
Nu hlaford bæþohte ic me þæt ic nefde mines abbodes leafe.
& ic þær fore ham gæwende & kom me into Ealdan Mynstre & gesohte Crist & Sancte Peter & Sancte Swiðun & þe wolde ac þu nære æt ham.
Ac ic funde Leofwine þone decanum & ealle þa gebroðra.
& hi me weorþlice & bliþelice underfengan & me to minan abbode geþingodan.
& he me bliþelice underfeng si Gode lof.
Nu wille <ic> þæ kyþan hlaford Ælfsige biscop hu þeos cwydrædene fyrmæst wæs <gestaþelod> betwyx Ealdan Minstre & Niwan Mynstre ealswa ic self hi <gehyrde> þa þæ ic geong wæs.
Hure hlaford Sancte Alwold læig seok & him kom to þe haliga Dunstan of Cantwarabyrig for hine to geneosienne.
& ure ealder Æþælgar abbod þyder eode & munekas mid him, þæt was Boia þe ealda & Ælfric decanus & Ælfnoð þe metere & Ælfwine þæ nu abbod his.
& þær coman munekas of Ealdan Minstre þæt wæs Ealdwig & Wlstan cantor & Godwine decanus & maniga oþre mid <him>.
Þa aras Boia þæ ealda munuk & sæt a cneowan ætforan Sancte Aþelwolde.

& bed hine þæt he scolde settan gode lagan betwyx þan twam mynstran on muneca dagan ealswa Friþestan biscop hæfde geset a preosta dagan þæt wæs þæt þa tweien hiredas weran eall to anan on eallan <godcunnnesse>.

& þæt wæs gif ænig preost forferde on <aþere> steda hi scolde ealle togædere kuman & þæt lic bebirian & eallne þeowdom don þe to Gode belumpe & a cirichalgamdeig þe biþ binnan Ealdan Mynstre scoldan kuman þa preostas of Niwan Mynstre to Ealdan Mynstre & þær beon to efensanga, & to uhtsange & to mæssan & to gereorde & þa preostas of Ealdan Mynstre sceoldan kuman to Niwan Mynstre æt Sancte Iudoces mæssedæge eall on þa ylce wisan.
& gif ænigan preoste mistimode on aþran mynstre ne fore he nahwider ac gesohte <he> his neahgeburas & hi him þingadan.

Þa þis gehyrde Sancte Aþelwold þa hæ rede þæt hit swa wære <nu> on his timan & on þara muneka & cwæþ Godes curs eallan þan þe æfre <þis> undidan & geaf to tacne þæt hit staþelfæst beon sceolde twa brune mæssehakelan ane into Ealde Mynstre & oðre into Niwan Mynstre.
